snippet: Loyalists to President Bashar al-Assad of Syria breached the blockage of two important bases, possibly opening the way to try to recapture lost territory.
abstract: Loyalist forces in Syria breach insurgency's extended blockage of two important northern bases; move possibly opens way for military to strengthen supply lines and recapture lost territory.

byline.original: By HANIA MOURTADA and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Hania Mourtada reported from Beirut, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Loyalists to President Bashar al-Assad of Syria breached the blockage of two important bases, possibly opening the way to try to recapture lost territory.

headline.seo: Assad Loyalists Breach Rebels’ Blockade of Military Bases
headline.main: Assad’s Forces Break Through Rebel Blockade of Military Bases
headline.print_headline: Assad’s Forces Break Through Rebel Blockade of Military Bases

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
